p: TableÂ 2 summarizes the macro-averaged F-score of all methods on 15 public datasets. NNC, together with Clusterdp and Hcluster, all performed best in 4 datasets. PAM performed optimally in 2 datasets. Following PAM, DIANA performed best only one datasets. Furthermore, we observed that the datasets in which NNC performed better were linearly separable (especially in iris, seeds and wine datasets).
